hero.title: Sovereign AI agents for Legal, HR and Finance — automate without losing control.
hero.subtitle: We don’t sell workflows and disappear. We design, deploy and continuously support your automations (n8n + private RAG + agents) with full transparency: no hidden fees, everything documented.

promises.p1Body: Deployment + iterations + support: we improve with you on real cases.
promises.p2Body: Everything is explicit (setup, monthly, consumption). No hidden fees.
promises.p3Body: Approval steps + audit log: you stay in control.

trust.title: Proof you can trust
trust.subtitle: A trust trio: engineering rigor, legal validation, real-world testing.
trust.card1Body: “Zero-error” culture from industry & aviation: robust execution and reliability.
trust.card2Body: Workflows designed with legal constraints in mind, aligned with EU standards.
trust.card3Body: Proof of concept in real conditions: refine with feedback before scaling.

solutions.title: Our flagship solutions
solutions.subtitle: Best starting point: fast to deploy, high ROI, and expandable.
solutions.s1Body: Auto-sort and rename documents (contracts, invoices, files) + routing + traceability.
solutions.s2Body: Generate compliant documents with approval steps and audit log (human approval required).
solutions.s3Body: Capture “invisible” billable work and produce reliable reporting.
solutions.noteBody: Our agents are human-in-the-loop: AI assists, your team validates. Reliability and compliance first.

usecases.title: High-ROI use cases
usecases.subtitle: We can automate more than 3 flows. Here are the most profitable across your target departments.
usecases.u1Body: Emails + follow-up + CRM, with scenarios and proof of outreach.
usecases.u2Body: Contracts, invoices, evidence: extraction, summaries, semantic search (private RAG).
usecases.u3Body: Sorting, synthesis, compliance checks, checklists and actions.
usecases.u4Body: Documents, checklists, reminders and traceability of steps.
usecases.u5Body: Time, costs, compliance: dashboards and usable reports.
usecases.u6Body: ERP / CRM / Outlook / Drive / API: connect what you already use.

security.title: Security & sovereignty
security.subtitle: What we can guarantee (and document): EU-first, confidentiality, auditability.
security.s1Body: Processing and storage in the EU (e.g., Hetzner Germany) or on-prem deployment if required.
security.s2Body: Customer data is never used to train public models.
security.s3Body: Encryption in transit (TLS) and at rest (encrypted volumes) on our deployments.
security.auditBody: Audit log available: actions, steps, validations — useful for compliance and internal control.

process.title: The “3A Certified” process
process.subtitle: 4 steps: robust, tested, result-driven.
process.p1Body: Architecture built by our engineers for stability and robustness.
process.p2Body: Pre-validation with EU constraints and requirements in mind.
process.p3Body: Proof of Concept and refinement with real team feedback.
process.p4Body: Go-live + continuous improvement: we don’t disappear after delivery.

founders.title: The founding duo
founders.subtitle: A rare mix: industrial execution + scientific rigor.
founders.f1Body: Electrotechnics/automation, management expertise. 30 years in industry & aviation (“zero-error” culture).
founders.f2Body: PhD Physics (Uni Frankfurt) & quantum computing. Complex systems and advanced engineering specialist.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Quick answers before you book.
faq.q1Title: Do my data leave the EU?
faq.q1Body: No. EU-first (DE/FR) or on-prem if required.
faq.q2Body: No. Setup, monthly and (if relevant) consumption are explicit.
faq.q3Body: Approval steps (human-in-the-loop) + audit log. AI assists, humans decide.
faq.q4Body: Yes. We connect your stack via integrations/APIs.
faq.q5Title: How long for a first workflow?
faq.q5Body: Typically 10–30 days depending on scope and integrations. We start with one pilot flow, then iterate.
faq.q6Body: Setup + monthly subscription. Any variable costs (LLM usage, volumes, options) are always specified upfront.

finalCta.title: Your first certified agent in 30 days
finalCta.subtitle: Book a call and we’ll identify 1–2 workflows with the fastest ROI.
finalCta.note: Goal: measurable, documented outcomes — with continuous accompaniment.
